text.name: sys_description
text.text: The Neo Geo Mini (officially NEOGEO mini), is a miniature-sized, semi-portable arcade machine that includes 40 built-in SNK titles. It was released on July 24, 2018 in Japan to celebrate SNK's 40th anniversary. It is out of gratitude to the fans who have supported SNK titles including The King of Fighters, Fatal Fury, Samurai Shodown, and Metal Slug that SNK has introduced this new gaming machine that compiles their Neo's most popular titles. Geo! We remain on a qualitative emulation machine.
